name: Vancouver Island Economic Alliance (VIEA)
address: P.O. Box 76, Station A, Nanaimo, B.C., V9R 5K4
description: Vancouver Island Economic Alliance (VIEA) has been operating since 2007 and is a non-government, non-profit society dedicated to spearheading regional economic development across Vancouver Island and the rural islands region. Funded by memberships, sponsorships, and the annual Summit, VIEA works collaboratively to strengthen and diversify the Island's economy. Key initiatives include Island Good, the 'State of the Island' Economic Summit, and the Economic Dashboard. Our vision is a diverse, sustainable, and self-reliant economy for Vancouver Island the Rural Islands.

name: Parksville Qualicum Community Foundation
address: 101-691 Beach Road, Qualicum Beach, BC, Canada, V9P 0A7
description: Parksville-Qualicum Community Foundation works with donors to build funds, grants to local organizations and initiatives, and brings local people and organizations together to strengthen community philanthropy.

name: The Truffle Farm Inc.
description: We are a Truffle Farm that offers Truffles, Truffle products, Truffle Trees, Lagotto Romagnolo (Truffle puppies) and offer events, produce, meat and flowers. We have Community Gardens for rent. We focus on creating an all inclusive unique Truffle infused experience from our farm to your plate or your home.

name: Lan Vietnamese Restaurant
address: 150 Hirst Ave. E., Parksville, B.C., V9P 2G6
description: Voted #1 Asian restaurant in Nanaimo since 2013. Now opened a second location in Parksville, BC. Patio is now open. 20% off for Chamber members until July 31, 2020.

name: School District #69
address: 100 E. Jensen Avenue, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2G5
description: Preparing today's learners for tomorrow's world.

name: Coombs Country Campground
description: Cooms Country Campground is a 34 acre RV park and campground, located 5 minutes from both Parksville and Qualicum Beach, on the way to Tofino. Every one of our 100 fully and partially serviced campsites promises a unique long-lasting memory, so come join us for some good ol' fashioned camping on Vancouver Island.

name: Society of Organized Services
address: P.O. Box 898, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2G9
description: S.O.S. is a not for profit, volunteer-based community service, offering resources, services and solution-focussed programs which promote self-sufficiency for local residents. Programs offered include Family Life programs, medical appointment transportation, Meals-On-Wheels, Christmas program, income tax preparation assistance, recreation assistance for children and youth, emergency assistance.

name: Cloverdale Paint
description: This Parksville paint store offers a wide selection of all homeowner, trade, architectural and industrial products as well as a full selection of sundries and wall coverings. Their staff is knowledgeable and able to assist with any project. They're great with suggestions and can color match pretty much anything!

name: Qualicum Beach Inn
address: 2690 Island Highway West, Qualicum Beach, B.C., V9K 1G8
description: A perfect blend of romance, charm and convenience, the Qualicum Beach Inn is a reflection of the values and character that make Qualicum Beach such a wonderful place to live, stay and play. A major makeover of the previously-known 'Old Dutch Inn', you'll find 32 beautiful rooms next to the beachfront. Each room includes wifi, a 50" TV, steamer, Nespresso coffee maker, iPod docking station, desk and bathrobes. Our pool and fitness area features a fitness room with free weights, treadmills and elliptical machine, along with a large, heated pool and hot tub. The unique design of our facility includes a door system which opens the pool to a sunlit patio with ocean views.

name: EZ-Vape Parksville
address: 101-124 Craig Street, Parksville, B.C., Canada, V9P 2G6
description: Electronic vaporizers, e-juices, and accessories. Over 140 flavours.

name: Spunky's Motorcycle Shop
address: 969 Fairdowne Rd., Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2T4
description: Spunky's Motorcycle Shop for parts, sales and service to all makes of motorcycles, ATV's and jet skis. ATV and jet ski rentals - Yamaha, Kawasaki.

name: Cascadia Liquor Nanoose Bay
address: 2451 Collins Crescent, Nanoose Bay, B.C., V9P 9J9
description: We are a full service Vancouver Island-based liquor store. Leading selections of local craft beer, wine and spirits. Our focus is to provide a destination shopping experience, that our guests can feel good about.

name: Boston Pizza Parksville
description: Family restaurant and sports bar. In the mood for some Boston Pizza? Our delicious menu includes an extensive choice of gourmet pizzas with fresh ingredients, hearty pasta, saucy wings, and so much more to satisfy all of your cravings... Check it out for yourself!

name: Rusted Rake Farm
address: 3106 Northwest Bay Road, Nanoose Bay, B.C., V9P 9E2
description: Rusted Rake Farm is a cafe style eatery situated across from the estuary in beautiful Nanoose Bay. Open 6 days a week (closed Mondays) and serving breakfast, lunch and baked goods their Farm to Table menu offers the freshest of ingredients with products grown on the farm. With a large patio open in the summer and a warm fireplace heating up the winter Rusted Rake has something for everyone. Brewing opening in 2019!

name: Island Wealth Management
description: Full Service Financial Advisory Firm. Specialized in Retirement planning, tax efficient Retirement Income planning, and risk aware Investing. Investment, insurance, GICs, savings, and other options. High value, high quality advice and service. Highly tailored advice. Fee only planning, or ongoing wealth management services.

name: Canadian Sleeping Barrels
description: The Sleeping Barrel — A cedar-crafted cocoon with an acrylic stargazing dome, king-size bed platform, optional fridge, wood stove, or mural. Guests don’t photograph mattresses — they capture magic and invite guests to feel part of the forest — not intruders in it.

name: Parksville Community Centre
description: Parksville Community Centre has a wide variety of meeting rooms for events, parties and functions at an affordable price. Main Hall 1250 sf and occupancy of 118. 4 large meeting rooms with festival seating capacity of 59, classroom seating capacity for 40, banquet seating capacity for 36, large square/u-shaped table seating capacity for 30. 4 small offices where businesses and organizations can meet with their patients/clients/customers 1 small board room for meetings of approximately 10 people 1 kitchen facility and banquet serving area adjacent to one of our largest meeting rooms. Most of these spaces can be rented for 2 hours, half-day, full-day, weekly, monthly. Daily Rate is a Maximum of 12 hours (An additional hourly rate will be charged for bookings that exceed 12 hours); Not-For-Profit given 10% off total cost before taxes; All rentals include free wifi. Coffee and snacks service can be provided at a cost. Catering can be done through outside caterers of the renter’s choice. Setup / takedown fee includes tables, chairs and clean-up discount rates for nonprofits.

name: Party With Dalen Entertainment
description: Party with Dalen Entertainment is your premier choice for all of your entertainment needs in the Oceanside area and beyond! Whether it is DJ work, photo booths, corporate game shows, karaoke, music bingo or more, we have you covered!

name: Shore
address: 2831 Island Highway W, Qualicum Beach, B.C.
description: Perfectly situated on the bustling boardwalk with sweeping views of beautiful Qualicum Beach. Diners can enjoy indoor and outdoor seating or take-out for a perfect seafront picnic. The family-friendly, casual atmosphere appeals to a multitude of loyal local customers and visitors alike. Offering a simple comfort food menu with fresh ingredients. Patrons can expect eats like ice cream, burgers, tacos, milkshakes, fish and chips with their popular signature batter and several beverage options to refresh and unwind.

name: Nanoose Bay Cafe
address: 3521 Dolphin Drive, Nanoose Bay, B.C., V9P 9K1
description: Tucked into Schooner Cove, with panoramic views of Fairwinds Marina, the Nanoose Bay Cafe proudly showcases the Best of BC with every sip, bite, and visit. Beginning in 2017 at the Water St. Cafe in Vancouver, to the opening of the Qualicum Beach Cafe in 2021, our team is proud to embrace this new community. Savour our menu of West Coast cuisine with Asian influences, light fare in the Coffee Shop, artisan goods in the Marketplace, and so much more.

name: myCEO
address: 827 Primrose Street, Qualicum Beach, B.C., V9K 1R9
description: Working with organizations, small and medium sized business, and within corporate settings, myCEO specializes in strategic planning, growth management, sales process and training and project management of digital funnel/digital marketing plan creation. We provide two key differentiators as a business. Firstly, our work with clients is customized to their needs, structure and resources. While we adhere to best practice principles, our presentations and delivery are not “templated”. We do not believe in one size fits all. The second differentiator is that our coaching business is not the only business we have run. Instead, we’re business coaches with real-world, hands-on entrepreneurial experience in both the profit and not-for-profit worlds and combined have more than 50 years of experience helping small and medium size businesses thrive.

name: Chances RimRock Gaming Centre
address: 4890 Cherry Creek Road, Port Alberni, BC, V9Y 8E9
description: From the thrill of slots to the adrenaline rush of a bingo win, Chances RimRock Gaming Center offers all of today's hottest games in a world class venue. Place your bets with Sports Action and watch the game in the RimRock Brewpub or choose your lucky numbers and try your luck at Keno. The Cathedral Grove Room at Chances RimRock is the perfect spot for your next function. Social gatherings, business meetings and more, at Chances RimRock, we do it all. From the moment you stand before the 500 year old sentinels framing our fireplace in the Cypress Lounge, you realize you are in for a memorable evening of fine West Coast dining. The Cypress offers an innovative menu that is ever evolving, prepared by our professional staff. Signature dishes with superb service brought to you with care all within the intimate grace of the Cypress Restaurant. Fun, food and great times await you in Port Alberni's only micro brewery; RimRock Brewpub is Port Alberni's new hot spot. RimRock Brewpub is the home to Clayoquot Lager and Arrowsmith Ale.

name: Geitzler's Cutting Edge
description: Eco-Friendly knife, garden tool and kitchenware restorations and solar-powered sharpening. Mobile appointments from Campbell River to Duncan.

name: Vancouver Island Real Estate Board
description: The Vancouver Island Real Estate Board (VIREB) is a member-based association of more than 1,100 REALTORS® who live and work in communities from the top of the Malahat to the northern tip of Vancouver Island. Our members are experts in the real estate profession, including specialties like residential, commercial, investment, industrial, land development, rental property management, and strata management. The board advances and promotes the interests of those engaged in the business of real estate. We provide our members with the tools and education they need to give their clients the best possible service. We represent our members’ and the public’s concerns on issues involving legislation and the vitality of our communities at all levels of government.

name: Alpha Strategy Media Inc.
description: ALPHA IT is a leading IT solutions provider offering a wide range of services to businesses in various industries. Our expertise in outsourced IT services, cybersecurity, and digital marketing enables us to provide tailored solutions that address specific business needs. We are committed to helping our clients grow their businesses by providing exceptional service and support. As part of our commitment to continuous improvement, we offer the Canada Digital Adoption Plan to help businesses evaluate and enhance their operations through digital transformation. We are proud to be a member of the Chamber of Commerce and look forward to serving the needs of our community.

name: Emerald Coast Design & Creations
description: I am a small design and print business specializing in customized and personalized apparel & giftware. I have a wide assortment of products that I print using 2 different printing techniques, enabling me to offer very unique products and giftware. I also design logos and business cards.

name: Harbourside Sprayfoam
description: Harbourside Spray Foam is a family owned insulation company serving Vancouver Island. Insulation contractor specializing in Sprayfoam. Services also include polyurethne concrete lifting.

name: Parksville & District Chamber of Commerce
description: The Page you are looking for doesn't exist or another error occurred.

name: Grant Investments of Raymond James
address: #3 100 Lombardy Street, Parksville, B.C., CA, V9P 0G4
description: Raymond James | Grant Investments is dedicated to providing exceptional wealth management services to the Parksville and surrounding areas. We offer Discretionary Portfolio Management to clients across North America. As a Chartered Investment Manager, Jim Grant is proud to be a member of the Raymond James Private Investment Management Group. He holds the title of Associate Portfolio Manager – a designation reserved only for those Raymond James advisors who have attained the highest standards of training and experience in the financial industry. In addition, Jim is US licensed, and a member of Raymond James (USA). This unique multi-currency platform allows him to manage US investment plans (including IRAs) for US persons living across North America, with our office located in Parksville, BC.

name: Pizza Pizza
address: 666 Island Highway East, Parksville, B.C., V9P T8
description: Fresh pizza - open 7 days a week. Delivery and pick up of whole pizza and slices. Gluten free, keto, vegetarian options. Sandwiches, Chicken Poppers, Chicken wings, poutine. MADE RIGHT. MADE DELICIOUS. MADE ESPECIALLY FOR YOU.

name: Evoke Floral
description: Full service flower shop and gardens specializing in fresh bouquets, arrangements, weddings, and event florals. Our store also features Vancouver Island made artisanal gifts.

name: Eu-Zen Healing Arts
description: Eu-Zen Healing Arts is a holistic healing centre located in Parksville, BC. Supporting community members within their unique healing journeys, we offer a variety of healing modalities — including Reiki, Reflexology, Sound Healing and Crystal Healing.

name: AFK Bookkeeping Services
description: Bookkeeping services.

name: Sarpino's Pizzeria
description: Sarpino's Pizzeria is a delivery and take-out restaurant specializing in premium pizza, in Parksville. We do pizza, pasta, wings, donair wraps, calzone and much more.

name: Cedar Street Designs Inc.
address: 643 Cedar Street, Qualicum Beach, B.C., V9K 1H2
description: We are a boutique Interior and Architectural design firm that allows for an intimate relationship with our clients. This results in an exquisite design reflecting your individuality and lifestyle. Our clients will be provided with personal attention, experience and quality results.

name: Buckerfield's
address: 587 Alberni Highway, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 1J9
description: "Your Country Store". We are your one-stop outlet for pet feed and supplies, plants and garden supplies, fencing, farm feed and anything you can't get anywhere else!

name: Misguided Spirits Craft Distillery
description: Misguided Spirits Craft Distillery is Oceanside's original craft spirits maker, founded in 2017. We're a small, family-run operation one kilometre west of Parksville on Highway 4A.

name: Arbutus Meadows Farm
address: 1515 East Island Highway, Nanoose Bay, BC, V9P 9A3
description: Our impressive facility hosts a variety of events year round. Home to the largest Hunter Jumper show on Vancouver Island 'The Island Classic' every July.

name: Lemon Balm Lane
description: We are a natural skin care company specializing in skin and pain issues. We infuse herbs into our products to nourish your skin. They include soap, shampoo, hair conditioner, ointment, lotion, cream, lip balm, essential oils and our best seller is our Pain Relief Balms.

name: Special Olympics Oceanside
address: 408 First Avenue West, Qualicum Beach, B.C., V9K 1J8
description: Special Olympics BC – Oceanside encompasses the communities of Parksville and Qualicum Beach. The Oceanside Local has a vibrant volunteer committee that are always striving to create more opportunities for athletes. In operation since 1987, the Local currently offers: 5-pin bowling, golf, bocce, curling, softball, swimming, and track and field. If you are interested in joining as an athlete please contact Yvonne Newport at ynewport@shaw.ca or to volunteer please contact Karen Tomlinson at tomlinsonkarenleigh@gmail.com.

name: Errington Pet Lodge
description: Located on 5 beautiful acres of land minutes from Parksville, we offer dogs a vast natural playground. We exercise 3 times per day. Full grooming services on site. Our cat facility has large individual outside runs for each feline guest. Owners live on site.

name: Janette Hooper Software and Cruises
category: Freelance Software Development and Travel Advising
description: Freelance software development with a side of travel advising and booking (specializing in cruising).

name: Pentlatch Gallery
description: At the Pentlatch Gallery we believe in the power of art to bridge cultural divides, foster understanding and promote reconciliation. We invite you to explore the rich tapestry of indigenous art and gifts showcased within our gallery. Join us in celebrating the diverse expressions of indigenous creativity.

name: Oceanside C-Weed
description: Oceanside C-Weed is a retail store offering recreational cannabis products.

name: BC SPCA
description: We are an animal welfare agency that cares for approximately 1,000 homeless & abandoned animals in our community every year. We provide many services, including cruelty investigations, humane education programs in schools, a low-cost spay/neuter program and other animal support services. We are a non-profit organization that survives because of animal-minded, and generous donors. To this end, we hold several fundraising events throughout which are essential to our ability to continue to care for the animals that need us.

name: Aspengrove School
address: 7660 Clark Drive, Lantzville, B.C., Canada, V0R 2H0
description: Aspengrove School is a JK-12 Independent School with students from communities in the Central Vancouver Island region. Aspengrove is one of only ten schools in Canada authorized to teach the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum in all grades.

name: Ricky's Parksville
address: 1182 Island Highway E, Parksville, B.C., V9P 1W3
description: From our humble origins as breakfast experts – to today’s menu with dozens of modern dishes for any time of the day, Ricky’s is a place where everyone feels at home. We're open 7 days a week 8am to 8pm. We would love to host your business meeting or birthday party and are open to anything.

name: Harris Oceanside Chevrolet Buick GMC Ltd.
address: 512 East Island P.O. Box 627, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2G7
description: Oceanside Chevrolet Buick GMC is the local General Motors dealer in the Parksville Qualicum Beach area. We have a wide selection of new and pre-owned vehicles. Our beautiful facility houses 8 service bays, a large parts department and a detail shop. We also manage Oceanside RV Sales & Consignment which is located next door to Tim Horton's. Our friendly and professional staff are here to serve you.

name: Bosley's Pet Food Plus
address: 104-280 E. Island Highway, Parksville, B.C., Canada, V9P 2G6
description: Bosley’s is British Columbia’s leading pet specialty retailer offering a full line of competitively priced nutritious, premium brand name pet foods, high quality accessories and supplies for dogs, cats, birds, fish and small animals.

name: Bridles & Bits & More Feed & Tack
address: 600 Church Road, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2B2
description: Bridles & Bits & More is the most complete feed and equestrian supply store in central Vancouver Island. We carry bagged feed and hay for all livestock, riding equipment new and used, including show apparel and casual clothes for the horse enthusiast. Pet foods & supplies. Hay delivery is also available.

name: Mid Island Labour, Ponds & Water Gardens
address: P.O. Box 23, Nanoose Bay, B.C., V9P 9J9
description: Mid Island Labour Ponds & Water Gardens specialize in renovations and new installations of ponds, water gardens, streams, waterfalls, fountains and pondless features. They offer services such as liner repair, filtering, plumbing, and water garden plant care, including on-site consulting services for all water features. They provide biological media filtration using synthetic beneficial bacteria and UV filtration, and have a clear water guarantee for high volume fish or large koi ponds.

name: Indaba Trading Ltd
address: #2 - 1067 Herring Gull Way, Box 865, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2G9
description: Wholesaler of unique giftware, featuring tableware, accessories, frames, furniture, candles and accessories, as well as plant & garden.

name: Parksville Adult Literacy Society
description: PQALS advocates and educates about the need for adult learning within our community. We fundraise to help strengthen language services (including ESL, basic literacy, numeracy, and computer skills) delivered through The Tutoring Program.

name: Arrowsmith Lodge
address: 266 Moilliet Street, Parksville, B.C., Canada, V9P 1M9
description: Arrowsmith Lodge & Cokely Manor are self-supporting, non-denominational homes for the elderly of Parksville, BC & District. Our overall goals are to provide the highest quality of care, consistent with the efficient use of resources in a setting that is as much like home as possible; to use the Eden Alternative Model of Care to create an Elder-centred community environment that addresses the three plagues of long term care: loneliness, helplessness and boredom; to make our services available to people in the community and to help those people remain in their community. The Arrowsmith Rest Home Society opened Arrowsmith Lodge in 1971 and the operation has been funded jointly by the Provincial Government and the elders since 1978.

name: Lease Link Canada
description: Lease Link Canada provides equipment financing to small businesses. We offer lease-to-own financing program on any operating equipment your local business may need: construction equipment, restaurant equipment, trucks, trailers, forestry etc. We also offer working capital loans, sale leasebacks and refinancing.

name: Mount Arrowsmith Biosphere Region
address: 124 West Second Avenue, Qualicum Beach, B.C., V9K 1S9
description: The UNESCO-designated Mount Arrowsmith Biosphere Region inspires a positive future for all living species by facilitating collaboration, coordinating participatory research, and supporting environmental, social, cultural, and economic sustainability. The MABR encompasses 1,200 square kilometres, ranging from Nanoose Bay to Qualicum Bay.

name: Big Boy's Toys Ltd.
address: 1421 East Island Highway, Nanoose Bay, BC, Canada, V9P 9A3
description: We have been in business for over 30 years. We are a full service RV Dealership which is open 7 days a week for sales from February 1 to October 31 and 6 days a week for November 1 to January 31. Our parts and service is open 6 days a week. Come visit us today.

name: Oceanside Makerspace Society
description: Our space promotes Technology, Sewing, Art, Silversmithing Studio, wood burning, leather, mosaics, pottery and all around creativity. Our motto is "making things". We have a 3000sq foot facility and a growing number of talented volunteers and resident teaching artists to help out! Tools are provided to students in each department and our teachers and our many volunteers bring a willingness to help each of our members achieve their greatest potential. All you have to do is bring your imagination, inventiveness & inspiration!!

name: Pathfinder Camp Resort Parksville
description: Located on Vancouver Island, Pathfinder Parksville is right on the Englishman River. With its stunning surroundings and a wealth of activities, it’s an ideal spot for days filled with family adventure and sightseeing. Whether you’re bringing your RV or seeking comfort in our newly renovated Englishman Suite, your perfect escape awaits. We have both 30 and 50 amp full hookup sites. We can accommodate needs: big or small! We have the right site for you and your family (even the furry kind)!

name: Crown Mansion
address: 292 Crescent Road E., Qualicum Beach, B.C., Canada, V9K 0A5
description: Fully renovated to her original grace, the exquisite details create a timeless ambiance. Overlooking the lush Qualicum Beach Memorial Golf Course, with views of the Georgia Strait, The Crown Mansion is walking distance to the beach and the delightful shops in town. The Crown Mansion offers 6 boutique-style hotel rooms available for nightly rental, plus 16 Villas available for individual purchase.

name: Career Centre
address: 110 - 198 East Island Hwy, PO Box 327, Parksville, BC, Canada, V9P 2H3
description: The Career Centre is a project of the Central Vancouver Island Job Opportunities Building Society (CVIJOBS), providing personalized employment services reflecting the changing needs of the District. All services are free to residents in the area and include individual employment assistance, workshops, assessments, and resources for job searching.

name: BGC Central Vancouver Island
description: BGC Central Vancouver Island provides experiential learning environments that inspire children, youth and families of diverse abilities to acquire & develop the critical cognitive, emotional, and social skills needed to become resilient and contributing members of society.
